font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 天真纯朴的： lacking worldly experience and understanding, simple and guileless
【例】 a child with a na?ve charm 天真无邪的孩子
【近】 artless, guileless, ingenuous, innocent, natural, simple, unaffected, unsophisticated
【反】 sophisticated, worldly 世故的；affected, artful, assuming, dishonest, dissembling, guileful 虚伪、做作的
【派】 naivety n. 天真
